description: This file is an HTML document that implements a web-based database viewer interface. It includes inline CSS styles for layout and styling, and JavaScript code for dynamic functionality such as fetching database, table, and data information, rendering tables, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables under a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables of a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data into an HTML table with scroll and expand features.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for each cell, handling long strings and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better viewing.
